title: Monthly Workstation Patching
description: An analyst must deploy the latest 'Patch Tuesday' security updates to all corporate workstations.

tasks.description: Review the latest security patches from Microsoft and identify which are critical and relevant to the workstation environment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies all critical patches to be deployed.

tasks.description: First, deploy the patches to a small pilot group of test workstations to check for any negative impacts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The patches are successfully deployed to the pilot group with no reported issues.

tasks.description: After a successful pilot, schedule the patch deployment for all remaining workstations during the nightly maintenance window.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully schedules the enterprise-wide deployment.
